original_text: Why, then, was the law given at all? It was added because of transgressions until the Seed to whom the promise referred had come. The law was given through angels and entrusted to a mediator.
korean_text: 그런즉 율법은 무엇이냐 범법하므로 더하여진 것이라 천사들을 통하여 한 중보자의 손으로 베푸신 것인데 약속하신 자손이 오시기까지 있을 것이라

sentences.original_text: Why, then, was the law given at all?
It was added because of transgressions
until the Seed to whom the promise referred
The law was given through angels
